files.name: README.md
files.content:
Welcome to Tyler's Terminal

Github: https://github.com/z00100001

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tylerclanton

Usage:
  ls               - List files and project folders
  cd <folder>      - Enter a project directory (e.g., cd 0x00)
  cat <file>       - View file contents (e.g., cat README.md)
  nano <file>      - Edit file contents (e.g., nano about.txt)
  ./launcher.sh    - Launch the project

Tip:
  Type 'ls' to get started.
